name: BlobsWorld
description:
Early Alpha of Blobs World not much to do on first alpha release new updates will be every week at the most

-Controls-

Move(W,A,S,D) you can use arrow or game controller animations not yet set

Enter BuildMode while holding wood (B)

Give +10 of what your holding (C) -TESTING ONLY-

Use/Build (Right Mouse)

Hit/Destroy (Left Mouse)
